data.label: hsynz
data.description: hsynz 是一个用使用同步算法来进行增量更新的库，类似于 zsync。 通过http(s)实现rsync；在客户端实现同步算法，服务器端只需要提供http(s)的CDN。支持zstd和zlib压缩，支持大文件和目录(文件夹)，支持多线程。

data.label: hsynz
data.description: hsynz is a library for incremental updates using synchronization algorithms, similar to zsync. Achieves rsync through http(s); implements synchronization algorithms on the client side, while the server side only needs to provide http(s) CDN. Supports zstd and zlib compression, supports large files and directories (folders), supports multi-threading.
